name: Soul Racer
description:
A party racing game for 4 players, use your life to boost your car.

R1 : Call for a switch with your friend

Driver:

R2 : Accelerate
L2 : Decelerate

Passenger : 

R2 : Boost

Team : 

Game Design / Gameplay Programming / Level Design : Sébastien Bréda, Kévin Ibanez, Arthur Manoux, Killian Beguerie
3D Artist / 2D Artist / Texture Artist : Tony Gimazane, Aurélien Gorgeon
